Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State & #65 Grand Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/St. Clair
ShortDescription: WB 29 State & 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State & Grand, due to police department activity near Grand/St. Clair.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #29 State and #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to police department activity near Grand/St. Clair.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express & #121 Union/Streeterville Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Grand/St. Clair

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express and #121 Union/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Fairbanks, Ontario, Michigan and Grand, due to police department activity near Grand/St. Clair.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a track switching problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a track switching problem.

Shuttle buses are available between Belmont and Wilson to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
